name: The Last Defender (Game Design Portfolio)
description:
You are the last spaceship to fight off the enemy, the last person who can protect humanity.

YOU ARE THE LAST DEFENDER.

Now that I told you this games EPIC back story I hope you will enjoy my microgame.

Note that you see the Unity logo at the start because I'm using the free version and that will always appear whenever you build a game in the free version.
